article_title: Krauthammer: 'Go Biblical' If China Behind Healthcare Hack
article_text:
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

Columnist Charles Krauthammer argued the US should “go Biblical” if China is behind the recent hacking of health insurer Anthem on Thursday’s “Special Report” on the Fox News Channel.

SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER

“If it is the Chinese [who are behind the hacking], as we suspect it is, and the hacking unit is named Deep Panda, that’s not — I didn’t make it up, that’s exactly what we call them, rather tasteful–if it is the Chinese, I would go Biblical on them, a hack for a hack. You don’t announce it, you would tell them, behind the scenes, ‘you hack us, we are going to hack you, we’re going to double hack you so that the Chinese will suffer” he stated.

Follow Ian Hanchett on Twitter @IanHanchett
